projects.name: IPL Powerplay Score Prediction
projects.description: Developed a model to predict scores during the powerplay phase of an IPL match using Adaboost Regressor, achieving a Mean Absolute Error (MAE) of 6.03. Ranked as a Top 10 model in the Guess the Score category at IIT Madras. Deployed and hosted the application on Streamlit Cloud.

projects.name: Face Recognition System
projects.description: Engineered a face recognition system for the IT department, achieving a 95% accuracy rate, resulting in a 20% reduction in unauthorized access incidents. Utilized OpenCV for precise face detection and recognition, with an average processing time of 0.2 seconds per face, speeding up identification processes by 25%. Enabled enrollment, training, and live identification, improving attendance tracking efficiency by 30%, leading to a 15% increase in overall productivity.

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis of Amazon Reviews
projects.description: Conducted sentiment analysis of Amazon reviews to understand customer sentiment towards products, resulting in a 10% increase in positive customer feedback. Leveraged VADER and Roberta Model for analysis, enhancing sentiment analysis accuracy by 15%. Implemented Natural Language Processing (NLP) methodologies using TensorFlow for effective sentiment understanding, reducing analysis time by 20%.

projects.name: Spam Classification
projects.description: Achieved 92% accuracy in classifying spam and ham messages using BERT, leading to an 80% reduction in spam emails. Deployed and hosted the classification model on Streamlit Cloud, ensuring seamless accessibility for users. Implemented state-of-the-art techniques in text classification, leveraging deep learning with BERT and Streamlit for cloud deployment.

experiences.description: Optimized response times at the Technical Research Centre (TRC) and ServiceDesk, reducing response time by 20%. Analyzed biometric devices and their functionalities, identifying inefficiencies and proposing improvements leading to a 15% increase in performance. Contributed to quality assurance and troubleshooting efforts, participating in the repair and testing of electronic devices, resulting in a 10% reduction in defect rates.
